summary: A young boy accidentally discovers a deep hole in the ground, where another boy is kept prisoner.
cast: Aitana Sánchez-Gijón|Dino Abbrescia|Giorgio Careccia|Riccardo Zinna|Michele Vasca|Susi Sánchez|Antonella Stefanucci|Diego Abatantuono|Giuseppe Cristiano|Mattia Di Pierro|Adriana Conserva|Fabio Tetta|Giulia Matturro|Stefano Biase|Fabio Antonacci
title: No tengo miedo
